reflection.text: I have spent one month in a Bayerische Family with no French contact during summer Spring in 2018. I went one week in a Montessori school. The rest of the time I discovered different aspects of the Bayerische culture (food, history, landscape, lifestyle …)
In 2016, I realized one of my dreams. I went 14 days in New York and I wasn ’t enough !

I went 8 days in Saint-Petersburg in Russia with my school. We learned about the town ’ s history, the link between France and Russia, … We went to a Russian school and it was really interesting to see traditional games.
